author: CMS-L1T-Jet-Tagging
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the v0.0.0 Level-1 Trigger SeededCone 4 Next Gen Jet Model to CMSSW. This model tags seededcone 4 jets into 8 different classes uds, g, b, c, tau+, tau-, e, mu and regresses a pT correction for the jet. 

This PR also includes changes to the jet data format to include the additional tag scores.
There are minor changes to the PF datatypes to add proper functionality for dxy 

The model training is documented [here](https://github.com/CMS-L1T-Jet-Tagging/TrainTagger)
This model is specifically from [this](https://github.com/CMS-L1T-Jet-Tagging/TrainTagger/releases/tag/v0.0.0) release of the code

This model's training artefacts; firmware, model file and performance plots are located [here](https://cms-l1t-jet-tagger.web.cern.ch/TrainTagger/tags/v0.0.0/)
The cms-hls4ml model file tagged v0.0.0 is found [here](https://github.com/cms-hls4ml/L1TSC4NGJetModel/releases/tag/v0.0.0)
The _in progress_ DPS note is found [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1485645/contributions/6261878/attachments/2987822/5262533/l1t_jettag_dps.pdf)

This PR relies on an addition to the cms-dist externals, with the open PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9778

#### PR validation:

Testing of the code happens automatically as part of the model training CI, artefacts of this are found [here](https://cms-l1t-jet-tagger.web.cern.ch/TrainTagger/tags/v0.0.0/plots/emulation/)

Standard code style checks have been performed as has a phase-2 Level-1 trigger cmsDriver test as documented [here](https://cmsl1tofflinesw.docs.cern.ch/Phase2/phase2recipe/)
title: [L1T] L1TSC4NGJetModel (Phase 2)
